name: interbank

between two or more banks: interbank lending Interbank lending had slowed to a crawl.interbank borrowing Banks that suffered sharp share falls were the most exposed to the soaring cost of inter-bank borrowing.
More examplesFewer examplesInterbank interest rates - the amount banks charge each other for loans - reached dizzying highs overnight.The central bank has taken steps to increase interbank liquidity.The investigation found that he had made unauthorized interbank transfers of large sums of money.Since the financial crisis, substantial effort has been made to improve our understanding of interbank lending.
